file_content.text: Killed your master, did you, snake? I know just the punishment for you.
This is my mind we're in. If I die, you go too.
I never said anything about killing you.
Do you plan to seethe at me until I keel over?
Do not mock us. Our ways are more insidious than you can dream.
You will never be free of us!
The Sith must obey tradition. Without it, the Empire would collapse.
I love you like my own child, but you are a blight on the Sith Order and must be purged.
